<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_amazon_echo_intent"> <x_snc_amazon_echo_intent action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>false</active> <always_available>false</always_available> <category/> <fallback>false</fallback> <intent_ends_session>false</intent_ends_session> <keyword>CapExBudgetStatus</keyword> <name>Is my IT Cap Ex budget on track?</name> <next_intent/> <order/> <output_speech_format>SSML</output_speech_format> <reprompt_speech_format/> <script><![CDATA[(function(current, content, attributes, erb){ /* erb.setOutputSpeech("PlainText/SSML", "Text goes here", "SSML goes here"); erb.setReprompt("PlainText/SSML", "Text goes here", "SSML goes here"); erb.setAttributes(attrObj); = Object of session attributes erb.setEnd(false); = Should this end the session? */
result = erb.response; //Required })(current, content, attributes, new EchoResponseBuilder());]]></script> <slot_name_1/> <slot_name_2/> <slot_name_3/> <slot_type_1/> <slot_type_2/> <slot_type_3/> <sys_created_by>jc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-04-13 17:42:23</sys_created_on> <sys_id>923229a6db8ef600d1a9f1351d9619b3</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>jc</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-04-18 16:14:15</sys_updated_on> <top_level_intent>true</top_level_intent> </x_snc_amazon_echo_intent> </record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: Is my IT Cap Ex budget on track?
